name: graphweaver-monorepo
description: GraphWeaver: Quickly build a GraphQL server using type-graphql and dataloader

scripts.database:rebuild-local: dropdb graphweaver --if-exists && createdb graphweaver && pnpm migrate
scripts.start: echo "To start an application, cd apps/[the application you want] then run pnpm start"
scripts.pub:dry: pnpm -r build --filter '@exogee/create-graphweaver' && pnpm -r build --filter '@exogee/graphweaver-app' && pnpm -r build --filter '@exogee/graphweaver-example-basic-app' && pnpm publish --recursive --dry-run --access=public
scripts.pub: pnpm -r build --filter '@exogee/create-graphweaver' && pnpm -r build --filter '@exogee/graphweaver-app' && pnpm -r build --filter '@exogee/graphweaver-example-basic-app' && pnpm publish --recursive --access=public
